translations: [计]升级；提高，加强（upgrade 的复数形式）
[计]升级（upgrade 单三形式）；提高，加强

sentences.sentence: Without upgrades and new capacity, bridges, roads and power systems are unable to cope with expanding populations.
sentences.translation: 如果没有升级和新的技能力，桥梁、道路和电力系统就无法应对不断增长的人口数量。

sentences.sentence: Despite all the reliability upgrades, with 70-mile winds, the trees will not just sway but come down on poles and wires.
sentences.translation: 尽管所有的可靠性升级，在70迈的大风中，树木可不会光摇摆，而是直接砸到电杆和线路上。

sentences.sentence: The G-222 aircraft, which were built between 1977 and 1985, are receiving avionics upgrades, while two will also be given sound-proof, VIP transport modules.
sentences.translation: G-222型飞机是在1977年至1985年间建造的，目前正在接受航空电子设备升级，其中两架还将配备隔音的贵宾运输模块。
